snippet: The singer-songwriter-playwright Jason Robert Brown performed a set of his songs that are just short of being cabaret staples at 54 Below.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by singer, composer and playwright Jason Robert Brown at 54 Below.
lead_paragraph: The singer-songwriter-playwright Jason Robert Brown performed a set of his songs that are just short of being cabaret staples at 54 Below.

headline.main: Striving for New Standards, Just the Way They Are
headline.print_headline: Striving for New Standards, Just the Way They Are
